REAL TALK

Yeah, I'm still figuring what exactly I want this to be as I go. Right now this is just a site for me to track my own lifts and get better at MEAN stack web development as I go. So shit is probably missing, broken, half-done, and/or all of the above. Hopefully it'll get better over time.
